content: interact with each other is shown in Figure 10-27. Figure 10-27 Microcode terms and interaction MCL Activation By design and with planning, MCLs can be activated concurrently. Consider the following points:  Most MCLs activate concurrently when applied.  A few MCLs need a disruptive configure off/on to activate the newly loaded microcode.  Activate traditional I/O Feature Pended MCL – LIC on the hardware feature: – Display Pending MCLs using HMC function or Resource Link Machine Information Reports – Activate using HMC function on a feature basis by PCHID one at a time – disruptive: CONFIG the CHPID OFF to all sharing LPARs, activate, and then CONFIG ON to all  Activate Native PCIe Pended MCL – LIC on a hardware feature OR Resource Group (RG) LIC: – Display Pending MCLs using HMC function or Resource Link Machine Information Reports Driver / Version Bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF
